segments.text: Oh no, the water is everywhere, and that poor woman doesn’t even see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is going to get soaked, and she’ll be so upset.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so naughty, and she’s going to be disappointed when she finds out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her, she’s just trying to do her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to hurt himself, and it’ll be such a shock for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is getting ruined, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would help her before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, but she’s part of the problem too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what’s happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
